thread.section_title: Le Bristol Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Flawless service
thread.title_full: Flawless service - Review of Le Bristol Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Anth1960
title: Flawless service
text: I stayed at this Hotel on February and everything was perfect! For me is the best hotel in Paris! The staff is so welcoming, explained all the facilities and services. It is a pleasure to engage with them... the cleanliness, the room, the decoration is amazing and I felt like I was in a Palace. Thank you for your availability during my stay, I definitely will come back for my next stay in Paris!
